entry.title: [BHS4/BHS6/BHS7][Infrastructure ] - Electrical background work
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 29, 11:00 - 20:00 UTC

Apr 18, 13:17 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure.

Start time : 29/05/2025 11:00 UTC
End time : 29/05/2025 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers might be temporarily unavailable during 20 minutes.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an electrical maintenance.
The operation is carried out in several steps:
Step 1 : From 11:00 UTC to 11:30 UTC, this step may temporarily affect Availability of servers
Step 2 : From 11:30 UTC to 19:30 UTC
Step 3 : From 19:30 UTC to 20:00 UTC, this step may temporarily affect Availability of servers

Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS4 are T04A, T04B and T04C
Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS6 are T06B, T06C, T06D, T06E, T06F and T06G
Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS7 are B702, B703, B707 and B709

Our technical teams will be mobilized throughout the maintenance to resolve any impact on your services.

We apologize in advance for any inconvenience caused.

entry.title: [RBX][Network] - Network core equipment maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 19, 20:00 UTC  -  May 20, 05:00 UTC

Apr 25, 15:00 UTC
Scheduled - As part of the continuous improvement of our services, we have planned an evolution of the network infrastructure on the Roubaix site on May 19, 2025.

Start time : 19/05/2025 20:00 UTC
End time : 20/05/2025 05:00 UTC
Service impact : Some network perturbation can be observe during the 3rd step for a duration of 5 to 10 min.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network core infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on multiple network equipment.

This maintenance will be structured around three phases, described in detail below :
Step 1 : Preparation of the maintenance operation (about 2 hours)
Step 2 : Deployment of the new infrastructure (about 3 hours)
Step 3 : Testing and activation of the new infrastructure (about3 hours)

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding as we work to improve our services.

Thank you for your understanding.
